item.title: Started my Personal Blog
item.author: jurgen.kluft@gmail.com (Jurgen)
item.description: Today i installed hugo and configured a theme and the basic pages. Didn’t realize that using a static-site-generator could be so easy. hugo is great, just one executable doing all the magic!
